interactivity.requirements: You must be on at least Day  230  to unlock this Event. 10 Makoto Lust You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Fireworks etc... "
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event automatically occurs on the first weekday on or after Day 230.

progression.synopsis: Having been forced to run some errands for another teacher, Makoto and Sensei find themselves in Sensei's office late into the evening. Not wanting to brave the cold quite yet, the two of them decide to spend some time alone together first. Before anything, though, Sensei's finds himself suddenly curious why Makoto seems to admire him so much, even after he revealed his true self to her. She tells him that, despite hiding behind layers of sarcasm and apathy, she feels there's "some semblance of a soul" buried inside him - Plus, he doesn't have much competition.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.12p1.
